node.title: Where Creativity Meets Code
node.content:
Exploring how programming and artistic expression can complement and enhance each other.
Many of the same principles that make good code also make good art: composition,
balance, iteration, and attention to detail.

burning-blends.title: Burning Blends
burning-blends.content:
Blog site for all things on my creative side - a platform where I explore photography,
painting, music, and other artistic endeavors alongside my technical work.This project serves as a creative outlet and demonstrates my ability to build content
management systems while exploring the intersection of technology and art.Exploring how programming and artistic expression can complement and enhance each other.
Many of the same principles that make good code also make good art: composition,
balance, iteration, and attention to detail.Built a responsive gallery system for showcasing photography work with metadata and taggingIntegrate music player for original compositions and coversDocumenting my painting journey with progress photos, technique notes, and reflections.Just like coding, painting is about iteration, learning from mistakes, and gradually
building more complex skills on top of fundamental techniques.
